message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GT, cs.MA, cs.CV 

This paper involves the use of artificial intelligence (AI) for learning to play StarCraft combat games with multiple agents working collaboratively. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also involves the use of actor-critic formulation, which falls under the sub-category cs.LG (Machine Learning). The coordination aspect of the game involves game theory, which falls under the sub-category cs.GT (Game Theory). The paper also involves the use of multiple agents, which falls under the sub-category cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems). Finally, the paper involves the use of computer vision techniques for analyzing the game environment, which falls under the sub-category cs.CV (Computer Vision).
